Private Litigation Case Title: FREDERICK WILSON vs. ROCK-TENN COMPANY ET AL
Info Source: https://www.law360.com/articles/954444/paper-giant-gets-initial-ok-on-8-5m-wage-hour-class-deal

Private Litigation Case Title: Mayer et al v. Administrative Committee of The Smurfit-Stone Container Corporation Retirement Plan et al
Info Source: https://www.law360.com/cases/4d2e039dcc853f2274000018

Description: Smurfit-Stone Container Enterprises, Inc. agreed to pay $162,500 each to the state of Illinois and the United States, and $151,440 to the Illinois Environmental Protection Agency in settlement of alleged air pollution violations caused by printing machinery. The case was also reported by the federal EPA; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/il-smurfit-stone-flexible-packaging

Description: Stone Container agreed to pay $950,000 evenly divided between the United States and the Commonwealth of Virginia, and install air pollution control equipment, in settlement of allegations its Kraft pulp and paper mill at West Point violated the Clean Air Act and state environmental regulations.
